title: Is BJP’s Vinod Agrawal disrespecting the tricolour? Here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture has gone viral on social media that shows Bharatiya Janata Party leader, Vinod Agarwal, supposedly insulting the national flag in the BJP Tiranga Yatra.

This post was also shared on twitter.

ALSO READ: Fake News: This animated video does not show the prototype for…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found this to be false.

On putting the picture through Google Reverse Image Search, we found this picture in a news article on hindi.catchnews.com dated February 7, 2017.

According to this news article, Union Minister, Radhe Mohan, flagged off the yatra in Moradabad by waving the tricolour and displayed a sense of patriotism towards the country. However, some Moradabad activists insulted the tricolour by lowering it down to the floor.

Another article in Patrika.com also claimed that the case has been registered against Moradabad activist Krishna Kumar Kale, who insulted the tricolour.

In conclusion, the Moradabad Activist Krishna Kumar Kale was disrespecting the tricolour, not BJP Minister Vinod Agarwal. Hence, the claims in the above posts are false.
